doc.field: Morris Rosenzweig was the comptroller of District 65/United Automobile Workers. This collection contains clippings, booklets, buttons, photographs, artifacts, ephemera and a typescript on the history of District 65 written by Morris Rosenzweig.

Morris Rosenzweig was the comptroller of District 65/United Automobile Workers. This collection contains clippings, booklets, buttons, photographs, artifacts, ephemera and a typescript on the history of District 65 written by Morris Rosenzweig.

This collection contains clippings, booklets, buttons, photographs, newspapers, artifacts (jacket, caps, luggage tag, leather case), ephemera and a typescript on the history of District 65 written by Morris Rosenzweig.
Morris Rosenzweig was the comptroller of District 65/United Automobile Workers.
Donated by Sheldon Rosenzweig, Morris Rosenzweig's son, in 2008, 2015, 2020, and 2021. The accession numbers associated with this gift are 2008.004, 2015.013, and 2021.023.
Duplicate photographs and typescripts, as well as membership booklets with personally identifiable information, were returned to the donor.
